Sentencas: The coal-derived gas from a coal gasifier contains multiple contaminants, and their synergistic effects may not be simply the additive influences of individual contaminants.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: The present work presents the results of a study of the synergistic effects of four contaminants of major concern-S, As, P, and Cl, at the ppm level and in combinations of two, three, or four kinds-on the performance of Ni-YSZ/YSZ/LSM solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: The results indicate that both cell performance and morphology differ significantly in cells exposed to a single contaminant, and that cell performance is not simply the additive influence of each contaminant.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: Synergistic effects can be very destructive (accelerated degradation or even cell failure) when S is in the presence with As/P, but can also be beneficial (stabilization in power density variations over time or a slowed degradation rate) when Cl is present with other contaminants.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: Cl can even partially restore performance loss when it is introduced after P is already present.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: Therefore, with the addition of Cl the tolerance limit of SCFCs for the other three contaminants can be greatly increased.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: We speculate that the affinity of the contaminants to Ni catalyst increases in the following order: As < P < Cl.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects

Sentencas: The interactions between and among these contaminants and possible mechanisms for their destructive and beneficial synergistic effects are discussed.
Titulo: Effect of various coal gas contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part III. Synergistic effects
